alert.note: Alert for Washington (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 27 at 3:29PM MDT until July 27 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Southeastern Washington County in southwestern Utah...Specifically Hildale... * Until 615 PM MDT. * At 329 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the The upper headwaters of Short Creek. This storm is expected to move over Hildale within the next 30 minutes. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, slot canyons and urban areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Hildale, Short Creek. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
